name: Clinical Supply Demand AI Forecaster
purpose: Cut drug wastage by 25 % via rolling demand algorithms per site enrolment curve.

risks.description: Slow enrolment causes sparse data for model training.
risks.mitigation: Use Bayesian priors; blend global averages until steady state.

risks.description: API downtime between IRT and forecasting engine.
risks.mitigation: Set up retry buffer; implement fallback rule-based forecast.

risks.description: Unexpected manufacturing delays for comparator drug.
risks.mitigation: Include stochastic supply side-constraints in model.

achievements.summary: Draft model reduced supply overage by 19 % in Phase Ib roll-out.
Integrated live IRT feed covering 80 % of active studies.
Ran first what-if scenario for supply shock, endorsed by Ops LT.
